long_description: Relax anywhere in style with the lightweight, ultra-compact Lafuma Maxi Transat Chair. It's great for quick and comfortable seating while picnicking, camping or enjoying an outdoor concert. Transat is constructed without a crossbar at the front of the seat for the most comfort. Batyline mesh fabric has a high resistance to rot, mildew, UV radiation and facing; withstands temperature extremes ranging from -22degF to 158degF. 22mm, powder-coated steel tubing frame is lightweight yet durable. Choose from the 4 reclining positions to get comfortable. Lafuma Maxi Transat Chair has a weight capacity of 310 lbs.
short_description: Relax anywhere in style with the lightweight, ultra-compact Lafuma Maxi Transat Chair. It's great for quick and comfortable seating while picnicking, camping or enjoying an outdoor concert.
